A compound adjective consists of two or more words.
Working as a server is a common part-time job.
Stephen King is a well-known author.
Peter did some last-minute shopping before the store closed.
Unlike iced tea, water is a sugar-free drink.
Usain Bolt won a record-breaking race.
She is dreaming of a mouth-watering meal.
My old-fashioned aunt does not agree.
Make sure your computer has up-to-date software.
